question: Is listening to Quran a sign of end of time
answer:
QUESTION
I read in a book that listening to Quran like music is a sign of end of time . I like to listening to the Quran (Surah Ya Sin ) while working , it gives me satisfaction and also want to memorize it by listening . Should I stop listening to Quran like this .
ANSWER


Share:
It is perfectly in order to listen to the recitation of the Qur'aan Kareem
and it is an act of virtue and reward.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
